column5: Thanks. he has been helping Dad clean fish since he was 1.5 years old. Here is him at that age helping me then laughing at himself in a video we were making.VIDEOhttps://youtu.be/yiaRZCkiE70

I have been taking my grandson to Wabaskang since he was 6 yrs old. That was 11 years ago and he will be with me again in 2019. I wish I would see more young kids with their families doing these kind of activities.

Hi all, Got out for a couple hours. Plan was to get some walleye for supper and then do a cooking video with my son. My son loves doing the cooking videos for his gramma and aunt in England. Plan came together pretty well.VIDEOhttps://youtu.be/TslsPSkhT5E
very cool! great to see that you get your son involved.
he loves being in on the videos and its really nice that so far this year he seems to be warming up to fishing again.

That was pretty awesome. I love the way your son shakes the flour / coating bags. That's the same way I do it. (I put on some dance music and do my best MC Hammer impersonation... very similar to the way your son does it). Very enjoyable video. Well done!
LOL...thats cool, will have to do a shake and bake video with music next time!
Greetings, Another great video! Will you accept reservations for any upcoming meals of fish at your home? Kindest regards....
I watched with interest and enjoyed the video. I am happy to see the youngster involved. Good Job, thank you
Sorry, fully booked for this week, have openings end of next week. LOL.
